title: ORDER
description:
Order is a request from a buyer towards a seller about purchasing some product (tangible goods or service) the seller is offering.
So from the buyer's perspective it may be called a "purchase order", from the seller's perspective it may be called a "sales order".

orderLine.title: orderLine
orderLine.description:
An order line is a part of an order that orders a certain item (the orderable product) in a certain quantity.
An order line might be splitted, for example if the ordered quantity is not immediately available.

CreditCard.title: creditCard
CreditCard.description: A credit card is a payment card issued to users (cardholders) to enable the cardholder to pay a merchant for goods and services based on the cardholder's promise to the card issuer to pay them for the amounts plus the other agreed charges. The card issuer (usually a bank) creates a revolving account and grants a line of credit to the cardholder, from which the cardholder can borrow money for payment to a merchant or as a cash advance. (Source: Wikipedia)

creditCardToken.title: creditCardToken
creditCardToken.description:
A credit card token is a key / code for an actual credit card number. The translation / mapping of this code to the actual credit card number is known only to the credit card issuing organization or its trusted transaction processing organization. 
Usually Boehringer only holds a credit card token for any credit card, instead of the actual credit card number (for data security reasons).
